decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Block plan, location plan, existing floor plan, existing floor elevation, proposed floor plan, proposed elevation plan. Received: 5th May 2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the  side walls of the extension hereby approved without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension
